name: CJ:TV
tag_list: tv-director, corporate-video, audiovisual-production, documentary-production, tv-series, series-producer
overview:
CJ:TV was founded by TV director Caius Julyan, this company provides audiovisual production services for the creation of high-profile broadcast, corporate video and documentary content.

Caius Julyan is a hugely experienced TV director, having spent 25 years producing audiovisual content for BBC TV, ITV, Channel 4, 5, Discovery, National Geographic – and the Web.

Since 1992, he’s worked as a freelance Producer and Director, across a huge variety of factual, entertainment and documentary output in the UK, US TV and corporate sectors.
